revised_title: Hannah Hitchcock's Ureter Case and Stalactite Discovery
tldr: This article describes the case of Hannah Hitchcock, a woman with a grown-up ureter, and the discovery of a beautiful stalactite found in a cavern near Plymouth. It also includes a drawing of an extraordinary calculus taken from a boy's bladder. The author, John Huxham, discusses the medical history and treatment of these cases, as well as the physical properties and formation of the stalactite.
